DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine which surgical approach is better for clean transection injury in peripheral nerves in outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Primary With Secondary Repair of Based on Electrodiagnostic Assessment and Clinical Examination
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment of injuries to major nerve trunks in the hand and upper extremity remains a major and challenging reconstructive problem. Our goal was to compare primary versus secondary repair of median and\or ulnar nerve by electrodiagnostic assessment and clinical examination.
DOC.criteria: patients with confirmed clean transection injury between shoulder and wrist crush injuries
